message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
I understand fair, but that offer isn't in my favor considering the inflation.  How about a 55/45 split?
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit from inflation every round.  52/48 is my final offer.
I understand you're taking a hit from inflation, but I'm not going to give in that easily. 57-43 is my new offer. Take it before the inflation gets worse!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair offer at this point.  Take it or leave it.
